name: Podcast Sync for Garmin Server
description: Server component for Podcast Connect IQ application.

NUMBER_MAX_USER.description: Maximum number of users using the application ?

PODCASTING_INDEX_KEY.description: API KEY for podcast search. https://api.podcastindex.org/

PODCASTING_INDEX_SECRET.description: API SECRET for podcast search. https://api.podcastindex.org/

ADMIN_PASS.description: A password to use for restriction access to admin functions (e.g. creating logins).
